summary: Bow/Arrows that will allow you to poison anyone without getting caught!
descriptionHtml:
This bow will allow you to poison your enemies without getting caught.

Keep in mind, however, that killing someone with your poisons is still a crime, and you will still be punished for it!

Note: I made this for personal use, and decided to release it to everyone, for the people who don\'t know how to do it themselves.

Installation:
1. Place .esp file in (Main Skyrim Folder)/Data directory.
2. Open launcher and make sure that the file is checked.
3. Play the game, and enjoy!
author: sjustin1996
